title: Back to being black
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

abstract: In the war, they were equal but back in Australia it was a different matter.
description: John Lovett reflects on the injustices experienced by his father and so many other indigenous war veterans who were not recognised or afforded the same benefits as their white mates when they returned from service.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2001843; In our Words: Stories from Victorian Veterans, Part One; Active; 2009
